# core.functions.sqrt { #optyx.core.functions.sqrt }

```python
core.functions.sqrt(x)
```

Square root.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                                         | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value (must be non-negative). | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                      |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|----------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing sqrt(x). |
